about.subTitle: I'm a Fullstack Developer
about.text:
Passionate about web and mobile development. I love learning new things. I am always looking for new challenges and new opportunities.

Being creative and curious, I like to create things and solve problems. I also like working in a team and sharing my knowledge

I also learned to use tools like Git, Github, VScode, Figma, Canva... As well as CI/CD tools like Github Actions...

Feel free to contact me.

arena.title: Arena Returns
arena.description: Arena Returns is a project initiated by fans of Dofus Arena. Two of us founded the project. Currently, there are 4 developers, 1 graphic designer, 1 community manager and 1 moderator behind the project. After discussions with Ankama, we are officially authorised to carry out this project on condition that it remains totally free and non-profit-making.

saigyou.title: Saigyou ayakash
saigyou.description: Saigyou-ayakash is a personal website/application for the management of my miniatures collection This one allows to add, delete, modify a figurine. It also allows to have global statistics on the collection like the total price, the number of figurine, as well as the date of the last addition. Finally there is also a wish list or for future purchases.
